alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 7:07PM CDT until September 05 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Western Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Girard, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Lamar, Frontenac, Girard, Arma, Liberal, Mulberry, Mindenmines, Franklin, Arcadia, Bronaugh, Lamar Heights, Burgess, Beulah, Croweburg, Yale, Hannon, Oakton and Iantha. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
